desc: XLR8 is recognised as an industry leader in sports conditioning, fitness and functional training. We are proud to be New Zealand's leading conditioning specialist with a range stacked full of quality products designed to meet the needs of commercial gyms, schools, trainers, athletes. Order or request your quote online.

layout.text: WE DO GYM GEAR, FITNESS & SPORTS CONDITIONING
Award winning industry leader , 25 years kiwi owned and operated fitness brand.
